\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
\hypertarget{namespacehclust_1_1main_description}{}\doxysubsubsection{How to run}\label{namespacehclust_1_1main_description}
The segmentation code is ran like this\+:

\begin{quote}
python3 -\/m hclust $<$dir\+\_\+raw\+\_\+tractography$>$ $<$\+Max\+Distance\+\_\+\+Threshold$>$ $<$maxdist$>$ {\itshape  $<$result\+\_\+path$>$ }\end{quote}
~\newline

\begin{DoxyVerb}Run to Hierarchical clustering.\end{DoxyVerb}
 \mbox{\Hypertarget{namespacehclust_1_1main_a41a2fd86558fc03916e942906181a472}\label{namespacehclust_1_1main_a41a2fd86558fc03916e942906181a472}} 
\index{hclust.main@{hclust.main}!Particional\_Hierarchical@{Particional\_Hierarchical}}
\index{Particional\_Hierarchical@{Particional\_Hierarchical}!hclust.main@{hclust.main}}
\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{Particional\_Hierarchical()}{Particional\_Hierarchical()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily def hclust.\+main.\+Particional\+\_\+\+Hierarchical (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{}]{maxdist,  }\item[{}]{var,  }\item[{}]{arbfile,  }\item[{}]{afffile,  }\item[{}]{partfile }\end{DoxyParamCaption})}

\begin{DoxyVerb}   Returns a ".txt" file with the detected clusters, where each list is a cluster.    
   maxdist, 30 or 40mmm is recommended
   var = 3600 ##minimum affinity within a cluster => #  N.exp( -max_cldist * max_cldist / var)
\end{DoxyVerb}
 \mbox{\Hypertarget{namespacehclust_1_1main_ab5e561ed7f885f2262d56b72f990f0ec}\label{namespacehclust_1_1main_ab5e561ed7f885f2262d56b72f990f0ec}}
